translation.en: ♪ Watch me backflip ♪
♪ Let me work my magic ♪
translation.fr: D'APRÈS LE LIVRE DU DR SEUSS

translation.en: [narrator] Just east of North Westville and south of Goo-bai,
translation.fr: À l'est de Norwestville,au sud de Goo-bai,

translation.en: a town known as Glurfsburg might catch your eye.
translation.fr: la ville de Glurfsburgattirera votre attention.

translation.en: Our story starts here. Who knows what's in store?
translation.fr: Tout commence ici.Qui sait ce qui nous attend ?

translation.en: It begins with a kite, and then...
translation.fr: Au début, il y a un cerf-volant...

translation.en: -[narrator] Shut the front door! -Whoa!
[narrator] That is a... That's a ninja! This is Dr. Seuss, so I wasn't expecting--
translation.fr: Un ninja !Dans du Dr Seuss, je ne pensais pas...

translation.en: Oh, why would you cut the line?
What's a piece of paper gonna do?
Oh, you just answered my question.
Dive roll!
[narrator] This sneak has snuck into a zoo!
translation.fr: Il entre en douce dans un zoo...

translation.en: Past the Moostrich,
the Walvark,
and the Llama-Gnu.
[narrator] That wall is no problem. It's barely a hurdle!
translation.fr: Ce mur le ralentit à peine !

translation.en: But the same can't be said of those large slapping turtles!
translation.fr: Les tortues gifleuses,c'est une autre paire de manches !

translation.en: -Oh! With the right flipper! -[screaming]
Okay, okay. Shh, shh, shh, shh. Easy. Easy, now.
Easy!
Easy, big fella.
[narrator] Yet, when the guard got there, see what he learnt:
translation.fr: Mais voici ce que le garde a vu :

translation.en: The cage was still present, but man and beast...
translation.fr: la cage était là,mais tant l'homme que la bête...

translation.en: weren't.
On your left! Busy inventor coming through!
Well, I'm gonna be late! I'm going to be late!
translation.fr: Je vais être en retard. En retard !

translation.en: [narrator] "Who's this guy," you wonder, "rushing round in a hurry?"
Relax with the questions. We'll get there. Don't worry.
-[bell sounds] -[Guy] Right on time.
This is it.
Who puts a puddle--
-Oh! -Hey, mister! Save the Yips?
No time.
They have the Yaps, but we're searching for a cure!
translation.fr: Ils ont les Yaps,mais on cherche un traitement !

translation.en: Please, sign here.
Stupid Yips and Yaps making me late!
translation.fr: Ces Yips et leurs Yaps me retardent !

translation.en: [woman] Oh.
translation.fr: SAUVEZ LES YIPSNON, NON, NON... ET NON

translation.en: E-Excuse me, sir. Would you mind taking a photo of us?
-No! -Great! Thanks.
That's not what I meant.
It's the button on top.
Say, "I'm ruining your life!"
translation.fr: Tout le monde dit :"Je vous pourris la vie !"

translation.en: [all] "We're ruining your life!"
-[smashing button] -Oh, come on!
I'm Guy, life-long inventor, here for the biggest meeting of my life!
translation.fr: Tom, inventeur depuis toujours.Je viens pour le rendez-vous de ma vie !

translation.en: That's nice.
Have a seat. We'll be with you in the next seven hours.
translation.fr: Asseyez-vous, on arrive d'ici sept heures.

translation.en: [narrator] Look at the neat and amazing inventions!
Every one worthy of Snerz's attention!
-There's an anti-umbrella! -[gasps]
And a tree stump de-rooter!
And right over there is a narrator muter! I wonder what that does?
translation.fr: Et une sourdine à narrateur !Je me demande ce que ça fait.

translation.en: [voice fading] Wait! Hold on! No! Stop turning the dial, please! I can't--
translation.fr: Non, arrêtez de tourner le bouton !

translation.en: -[people applauding] -Yours is a winner for sure!
translation.fr: Ça va décrocher le gros lot, c'est sûr !

translation.en: All right! Woo-hoo! I'm going to Meepville!
translation.fr: Super ! Ouais ! Je vais à Meepville !

translation.en: [woman] Oh, I hope we make the cut!
Fingers crossed!
Ooh! An auto finger-crosser? They said it couldn't be done!
translation.fr: Un croiseur de doigts ?C'était réputé infaisable !

translation.en: -[sighs] -So, what's your invention?
It's, uh... It's nothing special.
Ooh! Nothing special? Sounds special!
[man] Ooh, nice!
Get a load of that! Snerz is gonna love that!
translation.fr: - Voyez donc ça !- Snerz va adorer !

translation.en: [narrator] A narrator muter? These people have no idea what I do. This is my craft--
translation.fr: Une sourdine à  narrateur ?Ils ignorent que mon métier...

translation.en: -Support the Yips, sir? -[narrator] Ah-ha! I'm back!  My volume's off zero!
translation.fr: - Pour les Yips ?- Me revoilà !Mon volume est remonté !

translation.en: -Just in time to meet our other hero! -[whistling]
translation.fr: Juste à temps pour rencontrernotre autre héros !

translation.en: Whoa! Nice, try there, puddle. Not gonna catch me!
translation.fr: Bien essayé, flaque.Tu ne m'y prendras pas !

translation.en: Ah, why not?
-[woman] Mister, support the Yips? -Yips?
translation.fr: - Pour aider les Yips?- Les Yips ?

translation.en: -Oh! -I heard they have the Yaps.
translation.fr: Il paraît qu'ils ont les Yaps.

translation.en: Just tragic. Okay, where do I sign? Can I do it more than once?
translation.fr: Quel drame. Donnez.Je peux signer plus d'une fois ?

translation.en: Boing! Handspring!
Whoo! [laughs]
Here we go! Uh-oh! Coming through!
translation.fr: SAM, EN EFFET C'EST-MOI Allez ! Me voilà !

translation.en: Oh, family photo! Priceless moment! Say cheese!
translation.fr: Oh, une photo de famille !Un souvenir précieux ! Dites cheese !

translation.en: -Give me duck face! Tea pot arms! -[family laughs]
translation.fr: Duckface ! Poing sur la hanche !Jambe en l'air !

translation.en: Put a leg in the air! Pucker hard! Squat!
translation.fr: Duckface ! Poing sur la hanche !Jambe en l'air ! La bouche en cœur ! Accroupis ! On crie !

translation.en: -Scream! -[family screams]
translation.fr: La bouche en cœur ! Accroupis ! On crie !

translation.en: Thanks, Mister!
Hey, what's your name?
I'm Sam.
Sam-I-Am.
Guy-Am-I?
Is there a Guy-Am-I here?
translation.fr: Il y a un Tom Est-Ce-Moi ici ?

translation.en: I'm the only person in this room.
translation.fr: Je suis seul dans la pièce.

translation.en: You sure there isn't anyone else you want to squeeze in first?
translation.fr: Vous êtes sûre qu'il n'y a personneà faire passer avant ?

translation.en: Nope. You're the absolute, very last person they wanted to see.
translation.fr: Non. Vous êtes la dernière personnequ'ils voulaient voir.

translation.en: Lose the frown, kid. They're just a bunch of bean counters and pencil pushers.
translation.fr: N'aie pas cet air renfrogné, mon bonhomme.Ce ne sont que des compteurs de haricots.

translation.en: One bean.
Two beans.
[narrator] Our friend Guy-Am-I hasn't been a success.
translation.fr: Notre ami Tom Est-Ce-Moin'a pas connu la réussite.

translation.en: Every invention's ended up a huge mess.
translation.fr: Chacune de ses inventions a été un fiasco.

translation.en: All that failure has made his hope nearly run dry.
translation.fr: JURÉE Ces échecsont presque épuisé son optimisme.

translation.en: But today, he's gonna give it...
One last try.
7,462 beans.
7,463 beans.
All right, buddy. You're up.
[male Honcho] Dazzle us.
Isn't travel the worst?
Trapped on a cold air balloon with a bunch of strangers,
translation.fr: Coincé dans une montgolfroideavec tout un tas d'inconnus

translation.en: all of 'em yacking at you,
pestering you, never letting you stew in peace.
translation.fr: qui vous enquiquinentet ne vous laissent pas ruminer en paix.

translation.en: Stuck at the mercy of someone else's schedule as the last bus pulls away,
translation.fr: À la merci d'horaires décidés par d'autresquand on voit partir le dernier bus

translation.en: -and you're not on it! -7,469 beans.
translation.fr: - et qu'on n'y est pas !- Sept mille quatre cent soixante-neuf.

translation.en: Well, what if you could go where you want to,
translation.fr: Et si on pouvait aller où on veut,

translation.en: whenever you want to, entirely on your own?
Now you can.
With the Self-Flyer.
-Hmm, interesting. -Ooh. -I'm leaning in. -Intriguing.
I was ignoring the sad man, but he has my attention now!
translation.fr: J'ignorais l'homme triste,mais il a capté mon attention !

translation.en: Exclusive, aspirational, definitely Snerz-worthy!
translation.fr: C'est exclusif, ça fait rêver.Parfait pour Snerz !

translation.en: Oh! [chuckles wryly] That's good. Just what every child needs! A death trap strapped onto their back!
translation.fr: Oh, voilà ce dont tout enfant a besoin,être harnaché à un engin mortel !

translation.en: This thing is 100% safe,
translation.fr: Ce truc est sûr à 100 % sûr,

translation.en: as you will see in the following demonstration, when I 100% won't explode.
translation.fr: comme le prouvera cette démonstration,au cours de laquelle je n'exploserai pas.

translation.en: Ooh, I like it.
Don't explode. Don't explode. Don't explode.
Wowzers!
I'm not exploding!
Self-Flyer.
I think we're all in agreement.
translation.fr: Je crois qu'on est tous d'accord.

translation.en: You're going to Meepville!
Get ready to pitch to Snerz himself!
translation.fr: Vous ferez votre présentation à Snerz !

translation.en: See you...
SnerzDay!
[narrator] Guy felt fantastic! He'd finally won!
translation.fr: Tom était aux anges !Il avait enfin réussi !

translation.en: He'd invented a thing-a-ma-do that had done!
translation.fr: Il avait inventé un bidule qui marchait !

translation.en: Whoa! Oh!
No, not my beans!
[male Honcho] Holy moly!
Oh, dear. I'm not gonna say, "I told you so," because I've written it down.
translation.fr: Je ne dirai pas "Je vous l'avais dit",car je l'ai écrit.

translation.en: [narrator] Guy wondered why he bothered to even show up...
translation.fr: Tom se demandait pourquoi il était venu

translation.en: when everything he invented was sure to blow up.
translation.fr: alors que tout ce qu'il inventaitexplosait à coup sûr.

translation.en: There's Guy's critic, bean counter Michellee,
translation.fr: Voici la critique de Tom, Michellee,

translation.en: whose face always looked like she'd smelled something...
translation.fr: qui grimaçait toujourscomme si elle sentait...

translation.en: smelly.
Oh, just the thought of that awful device gives me the fuzzles.
translation.fr: Rien qu'à penser à cet horrible engin,j'en ai les fuzzles.

translation.en: I wouldn't let my daughter go anywhere near it. [sighs]
translation.fr: Je ne laisserais pas ma filles'en approcher.

translation.en: E.B. is very fragile.
[narrator] E.B.'s not so fragile. If her mom only knew
translation.fr: E.B. n'est pas si fragile,si seulement sa mère savait

translation.en: that she's luring a Pandog with cheese-stuffed bamboo.
translation.fr: qu'elle appâtait un Pandachienavec du bambou farci au fromage.

translation.en: [narrator] Mom would have a conniption. "No pets is the rule!"
translation.fr: Maman ferait une crise."Pas d'animaux, c'est la règle !"

translation.en: But E.B.'s not listening, 'cause...
A pet would be cool!
translation.fr: Un animal de compagnie, ce serait cool !

translation.en: Come on! Come on!
Don't worry.
I won't tell your mother.
translation.fr: Je ne le dirai pas à ta mère...

translation.en: [sighs] Thank you, Mrs. McGrisses.
As long as you buy me a car!
-What? -I like them red and fast!
translation.fr: - Quoi ?- Je les aime rouges et rapides !

translation.en: Flames on the side.
translation.fr: Avec des flammes sur le côté.

translation.en: You know I'm ten, right?
translation.fr: Tu sais que j'ai dix ans, non ?

translation.en: Hey, E.B.! Wanna ride occycles?
translation.fr: Salut, E.B. !Tu veux faire un tour en multicycle ?

translation.en: Do I want to? Yes.
Can I? No.
Because I don't have one. Because my mom won't let me.
translation.fr: Je n'en ai pas. Ma mère me l'interdit.

translation.en: Hey, why don't you hop on my handlebars then?
My mom would be able to tell.
She checks my eyebrows for wind-blownness
translation.fr: Si le vent m'a ébouriffé les sourcils

translation.en: and my general disposition for any traces of exhilaration or whimsy.
translation.fr: et si mon humeur laisse devinerde l'euphorie ou de la fantaisie.

translation.en: Ouch.
Yeah, you should just get out of here.
translation.fr: Tu ferais mieux de t'en aller.

translation.en: Just this conversation is slightly whimsilarating.
translation.fr: Cette conversationest déjà un peu euphorifantaisiste.

translation.en: We interrupt this old person soap opera to report:
a Chickeraffe has escaped the Glurfsburg Zoo!
translation.fr: Un pouletrafe s'est échappédu zoo de Glurfsburg !

translation.en: [gasps] Hey!
This animal is wild and should be considered extremely dangerous!
translation.fr: Cet animal sauvage doit être considérécomme extrêmement dangereux !

translation.en: Looks like I just found my new pet.
translation.fr: J'ai trouvémon nouvel animal de compagnie.

translation.en: [man] Greetings, we have some questions about the Chickeraffe.
translation.fr: Salutations, on a des questionssur le pouletrafe.

translation.en: [sighs] I already told you cops everything I know.
translation.fr: Les flics,je vous ai dit ce que je savais.

translation.en: Eh-eh. We're not the cops.
We're the BADGUYS.
Yeah, it's even on our card. Check it out!
translation.fr: C'est même sur notre carte. Regarde !

translation.en: Sweet font, huh? You have cards?
translation.fr: - Super typo, non ?- Vous avez une carte ?

translation.en: No, no, no!
D-Don't hurt me! I-I-I'll tell you anything!
translation.fr: Ne me faites pas de mal !Je vous raconterai tout !

translation.en: -[grunts] -Where is the Chickeraffe?
Better talk fast, 'cause this pole's getting really heavy!
translation.fr: T'as intérêt à parler vite,la canne est lourde !

translation.en: [whimpers] I-It just escaped! It ran away!
translation.fr: Il s'est évadé ! Il s'est enfui !

translation.en: He's a liar!
Please, McWinkle. Can I drop him, please?
translation.fr: Allez, McWinkle. Je peux le lâcher ?

translation.en: If the man were a liar, his pants would be on fire.
translation.fr: Si un mensonge il avait raconté,son nez se serait allongé.

translation.en: Those are clearly just scaredy pants.
translation.fr: À l'évidence, il a les chocottes.

translation.en: Tell me, coward, did you find anything unusual at the scene?
translation.fr: Dis-moi, lâche, as-tu vu quelque chosed'inhabituel sur les lieux ?

translation.en: Unusual? No.
Just a kite, a snorkel, and a pole vault pole.
translation.fr: Seulement un cerf-volant,un tuba et une perche.

translation.en: Gluntz, let him go.
[McWinkle] I meant let him go... free.
Oops! My bad. My bad.
[Gluntz] Sorry 'bout that.
How many jobs have I done, Gluntz?
translation.fr: J'ai fait combien de coups, Gluntz ?

translation.en: 862! A BADGUY record!
translation.fr: Huit cent soixante-deux !Un record de méchant !

translation.en: And how many jobs have you done?
Roof slide! One, sir! Uh, counting this one.
And may I just say, it has been sick!
translation.fr: Et si je puis dire, il était mortel !

translation.en: This was no escape. Someone broke in and took that Chickeraffe.
translation.fr: Ce n'était pas une évasion.Quelqu'un a volé ce pouletrafe.

translation.en: That someone has the animal. He is our target.
translation.fr: Ce quelqu'un a l'animal.C'est lui notre cible.

translation.en: Can you see me? I am jacked right now! [exclaims] I have always wanted a target!
translation.fr: Je suis remontée à bloc !J'ai toujours voulu avoir une cible !

translation.en: We find the target, we find the Chickeraffe
translation.fr: Si on trouve la cible,on trouve le pouletrafe

translation.en: and deliver it directly to the Bigman.
translation.fr: et on le livre au grand chef.

translation.en: [narrator] In Meepville, there was no man bigger than Snerz,
translation.fr: À Meepville, il n'y avait pasplus grand chef que Snerz,

translation.en: whose hair was, in fact, just a miniature Flerz.
translation.fr: dont la chevelure n'était en faitqu'un mini Flerz.

translation.en: Tell me, Yes Man, is it ready?
Y-Yes, Mr. Snerz.
[narrator] He owned everything that a Snerson could own!
translation.fr: Il possédait tout ce qu'une Snerzsonnnepouvait posséder !

translation.en: Like a solid gold stapler and a gold-plated stone.
translation.fr: Comme une agrafeuse en or massifet un rocher en plaqué or.

translation.en: Careful with my stone! It's covered in gold!
translation.fr: Attention à mon rocher !Il est recouvert d'or !

translation.en: [straining] Yes, Mr. Snerz.
[narrator] But his pets were his most belovedest treasures.
translation.fr: Mais c'était ses animauxses trésors les plus précieux.

translation.en: Animal friends who'd be with him...
translation.fr: Des amis animauxqui seraient à ses côtés...

translation.en: -[thunder crashes] -[narrator] ...forever.
Greetings, little ones!
-[animal groaning] -[Snerz] Stay!
That's very good.
Daddy loves you, too.
[narrator] Just one spot remained on Snerz's wall,
translation.fr: Il restait une place sur le mur de Snerz,

translation.en: and it was reserved for the rarest of all.
translation.fr: réservée à la plus rare des raretés.

translation.en: -[thunder crashes] -[Snerz laughs]
[narrator] Guy has inventions but no place called home.
translation.fr: Tom a des inventions,mais pas de chez-lui.

translation.en: And right now, he's desperate to take off and roam.
translation.fr: Il n'a qu'une envie :s'en aller loin d'ici.

translation.en: Where does it matter, be it far or near?
translation.fr: Le bout du monde ou le bout de la rue,où le porte son cœur ?

translation.en: As long as it's AnyOldWhereButHere.
translation.fr: Peu importe, tant que c'est ailleurs.

translation.en: [announcer over PA] The 4:28 bus to AnyOldWhereButHere is departing in three seconds.
translation.fr: Bus de 16h28 pour N'importe-Où-Sauf-Icidépart dans trois secondes.

translation.en: -Three seconds until-- -[Guy] No! [announcer] That's it. That was three seconds.
translation.fr: Trois secondes avant...Voilà, ça fait trois secondes.

translation.en: No! Stop the bus, please!
Stop the bus!
Stupid invention!
Stupid Guy!
I give up!
Stupid bus! Stupid town! Stupid sidewalk!
Stupid hat.
Welcome to our diner, diner!
translation.fr: Bienvenue, cher hôte,je serai votre hôtesse !

translation.en: Okay...
-Apps are over here. -I'll have the oatmush.
Swirl of jam with that?
-No. -How about a touch of honey, honey?
translation.fr: Quelques cuillérées de confiture ? Un peu de miel ?

translation.en: Just oatmush, dry, and a spoon.
translation.fr: Seulement le porridge, avec une cuillère.

translation.en: One Sad Man's Special!
[cook] One Sad Man's Special comin' up!
translation.fr: Et une formule spéciale dépressifs, une !

translation.en: [narrator] What to do next? Certainly not invent.
translation.fr: Que faire, à présent ?Certainement pas inventer.

translation.en: [narrator] But Guy needed something to help pay the rent.
translation.fr: Mais Tom devait trouverde quoi payer le loyer.

translation.en: [Sam] Afternoon, Donna.
Love what you've done with your fur!
translation.fr: J'adore ce que tu as fait à ta fourrure !

translation.en: [Donna] Oh, you! Same as it always is.
translation.fr: Oh, voyons. Je n'ai rien changé.

translation.en: Oh, wow. Look at this!
We're Briefcase Buddies!
It's like finding a matching snowflake.
translation.fr: C'est comme trouverdeux flocons de neige identiques.

translation.en: It's an unremarkable attache sold in most major stores.
translation.fr: Cet attaché case banalest vendu dans de nombreux magasins.

translation.en: And we both bought it! Plus, to end up sitting next to each other like this.
translation.fr: On l'a tous les deux acheté !Et finir assis à côté l'un de l'autre...

translation.en: I mean... wow.
I'm just gonna say wow!
translation.fr: C'est tout ce que j'ai à dire : ouah !

translation.en: I am Sam.
Sam-I-Am. Of the Glurfsburg I-Am's.
Perhaps you've heard of us?
translation.fr: Vous avez entendu parler de nous ?

translation.en: What's your handle, partner?
Grrrumph!
Lovely name. How do you spell that? Is that one rumph or two?
translation.fr: Comment ça s'épelle ?Ça prend un "rumph" ou deux ?

translation.en: So, Sam, I imagine you'll be having the ushe? If you insist.
translation.fr: - Alors, Sam, comme d'habitude ?- Si tu insistes.

translation.en: -Green eggs and ham! -[cook] Comin' up!
translation.fr: - Œufs verts au jambon !- Ça marche !

translation.en: Yuck!
[gasps] You don't like green eggs and ham?
translation.fr: Tu n'aimes pas les œufs verts au jambon ?

translation.en: No, I do not like them, Sam-I-Am. I do not like green eggs and ham.
translation.fr: Non, Sam C'Est-Moi.Je n'aime pas les œufs verts au jambon.

translation.en: Understood. Question asked and answered.
No further queries necessary.
Have you ever tried them before?
[sighs] No.
Well, how can you be so sure you don't like 'em if you've never actually eaten 'em?
translation.fr: Comment peux-tu en être si sûrsans avoir goûté ?

translation.en: Well, I've never eaten Walvark droppings, but I'm certain I wouldn't enjoy those either.
translation.fr: Pourtant je sais que je n'aime pasla crotte de morsamanoir non plus.

translation.en: But green eggs and ham are the most deliciousist, nutritiousist,  greenisist thing in the world!
translation.fr: On ne fait pas plus délicieux, nutritifet vert que les œufs verts au jambon !

translation.en: And PS, they're especially good here.
translation.fr: En plus, ceux d'ici sont délicieux.

translation.en: That's fantastic. But I don't want them, here or otherwise.
translation.fr: Formidable. Mais je n'en veux pas.Ni ici ni ailleurs.

translation.en: Tell you what, make that two orders, Donna. On me.
translation.fr: On va en prendre deux, Donna.C'est moi qui invite.

translation.en: No! Just oatmush! And a spoon!
translation.fr: Non ! Du porridge et une cuillère !

translation.en: Sad Man's Special. Tsk!
Suit yourself.
So, what'd you fail at?
[growls] Would you please just leave me alone? -[bell dings] -[cook] Order up!
translation.fr: - Veuillez me laisser tranquille.- C'est prêt !

translation.en: Oh, boy! Oh, boy! Oh, boy! It's coming!
Bring them in for a landing! The hangar is open!
translation.fr: Tu peux atterrir ! Le hangar est ouvert !

translation.en: -Here's the ushe, hun. Enjoy. -Oh, yes!
translation.fr: - Ta commande habituelle. Bon appétit.- Super !

translation.en: Excuse me, but I ordered mine first. Food comes out when it's ready.
translation.fr: - J'ai commandé avant lui.- Ça arrive quand c'est prêt.

translation.en: Oh, that's a good nose. It's an eggy nose.
translation.fr: Quel fumet ! On sent bien l'œuf.

translation.en: I'm getting hints of egg, and yes, definitely green.
translation.fr: Je décèle des notes d'œuf et, oui,de vert.

translation.en: Yuck!
Mmm! This is so good! It's like eating little pieces of joy.
translation.fr: Trop bon ! Ça a le goût de la joie.

translation.en: [moans] Each bite!
Joy!
Mmm! More joy!
What do you recommend for a celebration? Because...
translation.fr: Des suggestions pour fêter quelque chose ?Car...

translation.en: [all] We're going to Meepville!
-Drop the flavor hammer, Bert! -[cook] You got it!
translation.fr: - Balance la saveur, Bert !- Ça marche !

translation.en: -Egg-cellent! -Fantastic!
So green! Can't wait to try them in Meepville!
translation.fr: - Hyper verts !- Je voulais goûter ceux de Meepville !

translation.en: ♪ Funny, but it's true ♪
translation.fr: UN SEUL INVENTEUR NON SÉLECTIONNÉ"OH LES ENDROITS OU TU N'IRAS PAS"

translation.en: Hey, Donna, sorry to be a nudge,
but my Briefcase Buddy here is still waiting on an oatmush.
translation.fr: mais mon jumeau de valiseattend son porridge.

translation.en: -Spoon on the side? -You got it, sport.
Thanks. You're a peach.
Thank you.
No problem. That's what best friends are for!
translation.fr: Je t'en prie.Un meilleur ami, ça sert à ça !

translation.en: -I just met you. -[bell dings] [Bert] Order up!
translation.fr: - On vient de se rencontrer !- C'est prêt !

translation.en: -Sad Man's Special. -[sighs] Finally.
Careful! That bowl's hot!
I'm fine. Okay?
Great meeting you, Grumph!
My name is Guy.
Huh, that's a weird name.
Chickeraffe-catching apparatus complete.
Now, to test it on our first live subject,
the rare northeastern babysitter.
E.B., I'm home.
-E.B.? -Your daughter owes me a car.
translation.fr: - E.B. ?- Votre fille me doit une voiture.

translation.en: It's gonna be red.
Okay.
Well, thank you, Mrs. McGrisses. Yeah.
Oh, uh... [clears throat] Good evening, Mother!
Oh! There's the bean that counts most of all.
translation.fr: Voici le haricot qui compte le plus.

translation.en: I detect a hint of... -whimsy? -[grunts]
translation.fr: Je détecte un soupçon de... fantaisie ?

translation.en: I'll allow it.
So, who's excited about our big business trip?
Me. I am. Definitely.
But... counter-proposal, maybe I could just stay here.
But I thought you were looking forward to seeing Meepville.
translation.fr: Tu n'avais pas hâte de voir Meepville ?

translation.en: You know, I'm just worried about the big city,
where every step is a roll of the dice.
translation.fr: À chaque pas on brave le danger.

translation.en: Maybe I'd be safer here in boring Glurfsburg where nothing ever happens.
translation.fr: Glurfsburg est plus sûre pour moi.Il ne s'y passe jamais rien.

translation.en: [man on TV] Something happens in Glurfsburg!
translation.fr: Il se passe quelque chose à Glurfsburg !

translation.en: If there are children or over-protective single mothers in the room,
translation.fr: Que les enfants et les mères célibatairesprotectrices

translation.en: -you may want to ask them to leave. -Oh, my!
Do not panic! Chickeraffes are incredibly scary!
translation.fr: Pas de panique !Le pouletrafe est terrifiant !

translation.en: They have huge teeth, sharp claws, a beak that can snap a man in two...
translation.fr: Des crocs énormes, des griffes acérées,un bec pouvant briser un homme...

translation.en: I've-- I've seen this one before. Spoiler alert: It's all made up and not worth paying attention to.
translation.fr: Je l'ai déjà vu. C'est pour de fauxet il ne faut pas y prêter attention.

translation.en: Stare at one too long, and it'll steal your soul!
translation.fr: Si on le dévisage, il vole les âmes !

translation.en: Ah! What was that?
Was that a Chickeraffe? Run for your lives!
It can smell my fear!
Oh! Oh, my! Right here in Glurfsburg?
Cheese-stuffed bamboo?
E.B., this creature is not a pet. It's terror on four feet!
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un animal de compagnie,c'est un cauchemar à quatre pattes !

translation.en: Chickeraffes walk on two feet, Mom. Of course.
translation.fr: - Les pouletrafes sont bipèdes.- Bien sûr.

translation.en: So they can use the other two to mash their prey into a fine paste.
translation.fr: Les deux autres pattesservent à broyer leur proie !

translation.en: You are definitely coming with me to Meepville, young lady.
translation.fr: Tu viens avec moi à Meepville,jeune fille.

translation.en: And yes, the big city can be dangerous.
translation.fr: Et oui,la grande ville peut être dangereuse.

translation.en: Which is why we have these!
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'on a ça !

translation.en: They're Friendship Bracelets!
[bracelets] Genuine Friendship!
-[Michellee] Fun! Right? -[groans]
This way, we can stick together and be safe always, like friends.
translation.fr: On sera toujours ensembleet en sécurité, comme des amies.

translation.en: [narrator] The time hadcome to choose a choice.
translation.fr: Le temps était venu de choisir un choix.

translation.en: I do love inventing.
[narrator] Said his hopefulest voice.
But stuff blowing up is a valid complaint.
translation.fr: Mais en cas d'explosion,on doit écouter les réclamations.

translation.en: Could it be time to start watching paint?
[Sam] Hey, drive safe, Philip!
You may say those leftovers are for the Pandog,
translation.fr: Tu dis que les restes sontpour le pandachien,

translation.en: but we all know they're for you. Am I right? [chuckles]
translation.fr: mais on sait tous qu'ils sont pour toi.Pas vrai ?

translation.en: Oh, classic Philip.
Mmkay, it's closing time, Sam. Oh, right.
translation.fr: - Bon, on ferme, Sam.- Ah, c'est vrai.

translation.en: Right. Thanks, Donna.
It's getting late. I should probably be heading home anyway. Got a bunch of friends there waiting for me.
translation.fr: Il est tard. Je ferais mieux de rentrer.J'ai tout un tas d'amis qui m'attendent.

translation.en: Gonna be a real hoot. Possibly a double hoot.
translation.fr: Ça va être la java.Peut-être même la super java.

translation.en: I should give you my address in case you and the kitchen staff feel like coming by.
translation.fr: Je vous laisse mon adresse,aux cuistots et à toi, si ça vous dit.

translation.en: I still have it, Sam.
From the last time you invited us?
And the six times before that.
Oh, yeah. Of course.
Of course!
Night, Donna!
[Donna] Goodnight, Sam.
-[sighs] -[over radio] This is Officer 17
translation.fr: Ici l'agent 17.Je rappelle à toutes les unités

translation.en: reminding all unitsthat the Chickeraffe
translation.fr: Ici l'agent 17.Je rappelle à toutes les unités que le pouletrafe est très dangereux !

translation.en: -is extremely dangerous! -Oh!
translation.fr: que le pouletrafe est très dangereux !

translation.en: -Please proceed with caution! -[siren wails]
-[grunts] -[cop 1] Did you see that? [cop 2] Uh, yeah, I think it went down that alley.
translation.fr: - Tu as vu ?- Il est dans la ruelle.

translation.en: Dun, dun, dun!
[cop 1 gasps] Was that it? Check it out!
[cop 2] Uh, you go first!
You're coming with me, Chickeraffe.
[people in pool] We're going to Meepville!
♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville! ♪ ♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville! ♪ ♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville! ♪
[man] You can still hear us! [people in pool] Those are just curtains!
translation.fr: Tu nous entends toujours !Ce ne sont que des rideaux !

translation.en: [people in pool singing] ♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville... ♪
translation.fr: Ba ba ba ba Meepville ! Ba ba ba ba Meepville !

translation.en: [narrator] Guy picked the briefcase! He'll fix his Self-Flyer!
translation.fr: Tom a pris la valise !Il va réparer son voltigeur !

translation.en: My bad. He's tossing it into that fire.
translation.fr: Ah non, il le jette au feu.

translation.en: No, no, no!
